message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.SE, cs.SI, cs.DC

The paper discusses the evolution of DDoS attacks and the need for fundamental changes in network architecture to address the problem. This falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) and network infrastructure (cs.NI). The paper also mentions the need for incentivizing the development and deployment of necessary changes, which could fall under software engineering (cs.SE) and social and information networks (cs.SI). Finally, the paper discusses the operational challenges in mitigating DDoS attacks, which could fall under distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC).
